audio_mastery.reason: Learning Web Audio API from scratch

forbidden_rules.over_engineering: Keep it simple - first game, focus on fundamentals

gameplay.notes: Perfect fundamentals - game loop, collision, AI opponent all working

visuals.notes: Intentionally minimal - white paddles/ball on black background

audio.notes: Breakthrough - learned Web Audio API synthesis, gain envelopes

code_quality.notes: Procedural but clean, good foundation for future OOP

patterns_to_keep.pattern: Web Audio synthesis for sound effects
patterns_to_keep.why: No external assets needed, procedural control, learned audio fundamentals
Clean separation of concerns, easy to understand
Simple, fast, works for rectangular entities

patterns_to_avoid.pattern: Pure procedural code for complex games
patterns_to_avoid.why: Works for Pong but will become unmaintainable in larger games
patterns_to_avoid.lesson: Move to OOP for next game (Breakout)

notes: First game - established core patterns. Audio synthesis was major win. Dynamic paddle angles with trigonometry was challenging but worked. Browser autoplay policy learned (Rule 5 added).
